policy.name: Standard Part
policy.description: governs Parts that can be created by both engineering and manufacturing

user.name: Component User
user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' || program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_ComponentUser] == true
